book.title: The Mysterious Affair at Styles

character.name: Hercule Poirot
character.description: A former Belgian detective, now a private investigator.

character.name: James Japp
character.description: A detective from London’s Scotland Yard.

character.name: Arthur Hastings
character.description: The narrator of the tale and an old friend of Poirot.

character.name: Alfred Inglethorpe
character.description: The new husband of Emily Cavendish, who is disliked by her family.

book.description: Emily Cavendish, a wealthy widow, marries again to Alfred Inglethorp. One night she is found poisoned and Alfred immediately becomes the main suspect.

book.title: Ender’s Game

character.name: Andrew “Ender" Wiggin
character.description: A young boy who is selected for Battle School following an incident with a local bully.

character.name: Mazer Rackham
character.description: A hero from the earlier Formic wars.

book.description: Earth is at war with an alien species known as Formics which nearly succeeded in destroying the human race. Ender is unwittingly thrust into combat against them.
